# zfar

**Instance Property**

The z coordinate of the far clipping plane of the viewport.

## Declaration

```swift
var zfar: Double
```

## Specifying viewport boundaries

- **originX**: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the viewport.
- **originY**: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the viewport.
- **width**: The width of the viewport, in pixels.
- **height**: The height of the viewport, in pixels.
- **znear**: The z coordinate of the near clipping plane of the viewport.
